sentences: Tiffany Calver (born September 16, 1994) is a British radio DJ and presenter.
Calver grew up in Telford, but moved to London at the age of 17 in order to attend college and be closer to the music scene in the city.
Calver previously worked at Kiss FM.
She started at BBC Radio 1Xtra in January 2019, replacing Charlie Sloth.
She started at BBC Radio 1Xtra in January 2019, replacing Charlie Sloth. Her Rap Show on 1Xtra was awarded "Best Radio Show" by British magazine DJMag.
